text: Coventry is a town in Connecticut. It is in Tolland County. There were 12,235 people living in Coventry in 2020. Coventry became a town in May 1712. According to the United States Census Bureau, the town has a total area of of which is land and (1.67%) is water. == References == == Other websites == *Coventry, CT website Category:Towns in Connecticut Category:1712 establishments in the Thirteen Colonies
title: Coventry, Connecticut
